playbooks.title: Non-Technical Founder MVP Builder
playbooks.description: Build MVPs and pitch decks without technical cofounders. Market analysis, competitor research, prototype demos.

playbooks.title: Autonomous Startup Creator
playbooks.description: Claude independently builds complete startups - landing pages, product catalogs, deployment to production.

playbooks.title: MVP Planning Accelerator
playbooks.description: Compress 3-6 week planning cycles into 48-72 hours with competitive research, feature prioritization, user stories.

playbooks.title: Rapid Prototype Generator
playbooks.description: Test multiple product variations with different value propositions, deploy each to unique URLs for feedback.

playbooks.title: Business Plan Generator
playbooks.description: Generate investor-ready business plans with market analysis, financials, and go-to-market strategy in 7 days.

playbooks.title: Personal CRM from Transcripts
playbooks.description: Build searchable knowledge base of customer interactions from call transcripts with context-aware deal tracking.

playbooks.title: Custom Proposal Generator
playbooks.description: Analyze prospect history (calls, emails, objections) to generate tailored proposals addressing specific concerns.

playbooks.title: Cold Email Personalizer
playbooks.description: Generate hundreds of personalized emails by analyzing prospect companies while maintaining your voice.

playbooks.title: Lead Research & LinkedIn Outreach
playbooks.description: Identify ICP matches, research decision-makers, find company news hooks, draft personalized LinkedIn outreach.

playbooks.title: Competitor Ad Library Analyzer
playbooks.description: Browse Meta Ad Library and Google Ads to categorize competitor ads, identify patterns, extract proven hooks.

playbooks.title: SEO Content Auditor
playbooks.description: Automate crawling, content quality analysis, meta tag checking, keyword cannibalization detection.

playbooks.title: Ad Copy Variation Generator
playbooks.description: Analyze historical ad performance to identify patterns and generate hundreds of new variations from winners.

playbooks.title: Competitor Comparison Matrix
playbooks.description: Comprehensive analysis across positioning, messaging, content, social, advertising, pricing, and reviews.

playbooks.title: Bulk Contract Analyzer
playbooks.description: Analyze massive contract volumes for M&A due diligence, extracting key provisions into searchable database.

playbooks.title: Contract Redliner
playbooks.description: Compare document versions, identify changes, categorize by risk level, draft pushback responses.

playbooks.title: Due Diligence Automator
playbooks.description: Review data room documents across contracts, litigation, IP, compliance, employment with risk flagging.

playbooks.title: Novel Writing Assistant
playbooks.description: Maintain story consistency across chapters by referencing character profiles, world rules, and timelines.

playbooks.title: World-Building & Character Profiles
playbooks.description: Build comprehensive story documentation with character templates, location wikis, magic systems, timelines.

playbooks.title: Changelog Generator
playbooks.description: Scan git commits, group changes, translate technical jargon to user language in 10-15 minutes.

playbooks.title: HTML Presentation Builder
playbooks.description: Generate clean HTML presentation slides with speaker notes that can be imported to PowerPoint.

playbooks.title: Personal Dashboard Builder
playbooks.description: Aggregate daily info (calendar, tasks, weather, news, goals) into personalized single-view dashboard.

playbooks.title: Communication App for Speech Difficulties
playbooks.description: Build predictive text app with speech-to-text, quick response buttons, and voice output.

playbooks.title: Speech Therapy Practice App
playbooks.description: Custom speech practice apps for specific therapy goals with recognition and progress tracking.

playbooks.title: Custom Assistive Tools
playbooks.description: Build personalized assistive technology for unique needs (visual schedules, memory aids, reminders).

playbooks.title: AI-Powered Second Brain
playbooks.description: Transform markdown notes into queryable knowledge base that synthesizes information across vault.

playbooks.title: 24/7 Note Server
playbooks.description: Run Claude Code on remote server with continuous vault access for background processing and queries.

playbooks.title: Background Research Processor
playbooks.description: Spawn research agents while writing to compile findings in background without interrupting flow.

playbooks.title: Event Ticket Booking Assistant
playbooks.description: Review calendars, browse venue availability, compare prices, recommend optimal dates.

playbooks.title: ADHD-Friendly Task Manager
playbooks.description: Break tasks into dopamine-friendly chunks, schedule based on energy patterns, identify daily priorities.

playbooks.title: Mental Health Journal Assistant
playbooks.description: Reflective journaling templates, probing questions, pattern identification, growth insights.

playbooks.title: Natural Language Home Automation
playbooks.description: Translate natural language intentions into working automation code for Home Assistant, HomeKit, SmartThings.

playbooks.title: Gmail-to-Slack Summary Bot
playbooks.description: Automatically summarize incoming emails and DM important ones to Slack with priority flagging.

playbooks.title: Inbox Zero Manager
playbooks.description: Bulk-process 500+ unread emails with categorization, response drafting, priority flagging.

playbooks.title: Email Thread Data Extractor
playbooks.description: Extract structured data from email threads (dates, action items, decisions) into calendar, tasks, logs.

playbooks.title: Claude in Slack
playbooks.description: Delegate research and analysis tasks from Slack; Claude works in background and notifies completion.

playbooks.title: Photo Organization by Event
playbooks.description: Read EXIF metadata, analyze image content, organize into Year > Month > Event structure.

playbooks.title: Duplicate File Detector
playbooks.description: Identify exact duplicates, near-duplicates, version variants with recommendations (no auto-deletion).

playbooks.title: Project Inventory & Documentation
playbooks.description: Analyze /projects folder, understand what each does, create documented inventory with tech stacks.

playbooks.title: Old File Cleanup Assistant
playbooks.description: Identify safely deletable old files with intelligent recommendations considering age and type.

playbooks.title: 7-Minute Digital Declutter
playbooks.description: Complete digital cleanup (photos, documents, projects) in 7 minutes vs 3 hours manually.

playbooks.title: Professional Tax Agent
playbooks.description: Create knowledge base from tax documents for reference when answering questions with citations.

playbooks.title: Contract & Invoice Cross-Reference
playbooks.description: Verify invoices match contract terms, identify missed billing, flag discrepancies, total by client.

playbooks.title: Multi-Card Expense Tracker
playbooks.description: Combine multiple credit card/bank statements, categorize, match receipts, generate expense reports.

playbooks.title: Mac Performance Diagnostics
playbooks.description: Run diagnostic commands, analyze results, explain findings in plain English, provide resolution steps.

playbooks.title: Error Message Explainer
playbooks.description: Explain error messages, diagnose causes, walk through solutions with risk assessment.

playbooks.title: Disk Space Analyzer
playbooks.description: Identify what's consuming disk space (old backups, duplicates, caches), prioritize cleanup by impact.

playbooks.title: Corrupted File Data Extractor
playbooks.description: Analyze binary structures, identify intact sections, extract salvageable content from corrupted files.

playbooks.title: Session History Recovery
playbooks.description: Search Claude Code session history to recover code, files, or solutions from previous sessions.

playbooks.title: Legacy File Format Converter
playbooks.description: Analyze obsolete file formats (WordPerfect, Lotus 1-2-3), extract content into modern formats.
